Text: St Mary's Church, Acton:  A church has been present on this site since before the time of the Domesday Survey.

Text: St Mary's Church, Acton:  One unusual feature of the interior of the church is that the old stone seating around its sides has been retained.

Text: St Mary's Church, Acton:  In the south aisle are some ancient carved stones dating back to the Norman era.

6:
--------------------
Text: St Mary's Church, Acton:  The architectural historian Alec Clifton-Taylor includes the church in his list of 'best' English parish churches.

8:

Text: St Mary's Church, Acton: The church is an active Anglican parish church in the diocese of Chester, the archdeaconry of Macclesfield and the deanery of Nantwich.
